org.resthub.tapestry5.jpa.services

Class ResthubJPAModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.resthub.tapestry5.jpa.services.ResthubJPAModule

  • @SubModule(value={org.tynamo.jpa.JPAModule.class,org.tynamo.jpa.JPACoreModule.class})
public class ResthubJPAModule
extends Object
    Provide configuration for Tapestry5 resthub jpa module : contributions of services, behaviours, configuration parameters, libraries, etc. Basically, configure inclusion of spring defined jpa entity manager into a Tapestry5 managed JpaEntityManagerSource provided by tynamo third party library
    Author:
    bmeurant
